high_descs: Turn around and face the yellow vase on the shelf.
Pick up the yellow vase on the shelf.
Turn right and bring the vase over to the lamp on the table.
Turn on the lamp on the table.
anns.task_desc: Examine the yellow vase by the light of the lamp on the table.

high_descs: Turn left and face the book shelf.
Pick up the yellow vase from the shelf.
Turn around and go to the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Look at the yellow vase using the light from the lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and take a step to the wall, then turn right to face the shelf.
Pick up the yellow object from the shelf.
Turn around and take a step forward, then turn left and walk toward the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Turn the lamp on the desk on while holding a yellow object.

high_descs: Move to the dark brown book shelf next to the tennis racket
Pick up the gold vase sitting on the shelf
Carry the gold vase over to the wood desk to the right of the night stand
Turn on the lamp on top of the desk
anns.task_desc: Carry a vase while turning on a lamp

high_descs: Move to the shelf to the left of you
Pick up a gold disk from the shelf
Move to the desk to the right of the bed
Turn on the lamp
anns.task_desc: Inspect a gold disk with the light on the desk next to the bed.

high_descs: Turn around and walk up to the brown shelving on the right.
Pick up the yellow plate from the bottom shelf.
Turn to your right and walk over to the desk that is to the right of the nightstand.
Turn on the lamp that is on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a yellow plate under the light of a lamp.
